comments: Define a triangle U(n,k) with U(n,0) = n*(n+1) + 1 for n>=0 and U(r,c) = U(r-1,c-1) + U(r-1,c).  The sum of the terms in row n is a(n). The first rows are 1; 3, 3; 7, 6, 7; 13, 13, 13, 13; 21, 26, 26, 26, 21; row sums are 1, 6, 20, 52, 120. - _J. M. Bergot_, Feb 15 2013This triangle is now A222405. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 18 2013
formula: a(n) = 9*2^n - 4n - 8 (conjectured). - _Ralf Stephan_, Feb 13 2004Conjectures from _Colin Barker_, Feb 17 2016: (Start)a(n) = 4*a(n-1)-5*a(n-2)+2*a(n-3) for n>2.G.f.: (1+x)^2 / ((1-x)^2*(1-2*x)).(End)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
